title: Kourtney Kardashian shares throwback to epic Ariana Grande Halloween costume
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Reality TV icon Kourtney Kardashian has reminded fans that she has seriously cool taste when it comes to Halloween .

The 40 year-old shared a snap with her 82.2 million followers of herself during last year's spook night, sat at a piano and rocking a certain iconic high ponytail.

Kourtney completed her Ariana look with some strong eye make-up, pink dress and matching nails.

She also clutched a microphone, and posted a second photo of her in front of a pile of pumpkins and a skeleton.

The star captioned her post "No Tears Left to Cry", a reference to one of pop queen Ariana's biggest hits.

Fans have, of course, gone mad over the throwback.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

One wrote: "Your inner Ariana Grande should have been the caption 'cause you nailed it, someone tag Ari."

Others poured praise of Kourtney's Halloween decorations, while some just replied with heart eye emojis.

It's not the first time Kourtney's has the Internet in a tizzy over a new look - last month, she channelled her alter ego Daisy in a mirror selfie featuring a Rapunzel-esque blond wig.

Aside from the alter egos and Halloween costumes, Kourtney's been keeping herself busy with her career.

(Image: Kourtney Kardashian/Poosh/Pim)

She recently launched Poosh, her online lifestyle and e-commerce destination.

None of her sisters were there, but her mum Kris was, and Kourtney feels that was a good thing for her.

Chatting with People magazine , the mum of three said: "I think doing such a successful event [with just my mum] made me stronger. It made me think, you know, that I could do it on my own.

"What feels authentic to me for a launch feels different to Kim, feels different to Kylie. So it's nice to just have our own approaches.

"I feel like it was a big thing for me to only take on something my heart and soul was really in."

She also let slip about her sisters, and who's her favourite.

Kourtney said: "[My favourite sister] changes every day. Today it's Khloe. Yesterday it was not Khloe.

"Yesterday it was Kim."
description: Kourtney dressed as the pop sensation for Halloween last year, complete with iconic high ponytail and pink dress
